Im doing a research project and I need to know where I can find 
Primary  documents, on the samuri's rules of engagement, or the 
conduct in war. the documents need to be from primary sources about 
the way they conducted themselves in war, or how they were to treat 
the enemy,the prisoners( If they took any or not ), or how the 
civilans were treated. thanks for help send ideas to 
scubastevenson@...
